BlastN, created for a special application 

runtime_ - Float - Maximum Hours to Run (click here for help setting this correctly)
query_ - Primary Input File, named query.fasta
use_epa_ - Switch - Use can specify whether or not they are using EPA Evolutionary Placement algorithm)
nucleotid_db_ - Excl - Sets the database that will be used. Default = 5_8S; allowed values
nuclsu, nucssu, mitssu, rpb1, rpb2, unaligned_its, unaligned_lsu, unaligned_ssu, unaligned_mitssu, unaligned_rpb1, unaligned_rpb2
(the misspelling is actual, for this database)  NOTE: unaligned databases cannot be used when use_epa=1
